channel.title: Nomad {PI} help!
channel.description: Hello, well I feel dumb but where do I change the stats for nomad like what is max hit his and how he attacks you and it str def blah blah blah etc etc....

item.title: Nomad {PI} help!
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

in the spawn config cfg file if you’re auto spawning it.
If you’re spawning it elsewhere then take a look at the parameters for the spawning npc method.
I also believe there is a seperate max hit int-method in the NPCHandler class.

Read full topic
